gameDetails.name: Transformers Armada:  Battle for Cybertron
gameDetails.description: Similar to Star Wars: Epic Duels, but based in the Transformers Universe, this game allows you to create your own robot battles between the Autobots and Decepticons.  The game includes 8 fully painted PVC figures from the Transformers Armada toyline/anime/comic book series, character cards, action cards, battle field boards, 1 movement die, wound markers, and rules.
